root.name: Rock 'n' Roll Adventures
root.description: Rock 'n' Roll Adventures is a platform game where you play as Elviz bating against evil musical instruments. Like many games by Data Design Interactive it is cheaply made and reuses assets from other games. In this case the game appears to be a mostly pallet swapped Ninjabread Man.TriviaOn the game box's spine it reads Rock 'n' Roll Advnetures. Yes, with a spelling mistake.

similar_games.game: Billy the Wizard: Rocket Broomstick Racing
